column3: Traffic;PHNOM PENH: A------ suspected drunk driver hit a street food stall at 11 pm on October 22
column7: the drunk man was driving a white RAV4
column9: left the road and hit the food stall
column11: but no injuries..------Shortly after the incident
column12: the local police arrived at the scene. Neither the food stall owner or the driver wanted to make a big fuss
column13: and a $ 200 compensation was agreed to end the matter. ------POST NEWS
